entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Valemount
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries late this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
